name: Motorcycle Storm Rider Racing
description: Race and maneuver your heavy bike to beat your rivals with your exceptional racing skills in this extreme bike racing game. In Real screech of tires skidding on tarmac as the rear wheel loses traction and you fight to regain control of your bike. Race for the Gold medal, Silver medal and Bronze medal. Full throttle incredible ramps to perform exact mid-air insane acrobatic stunts. Frustrating obstacles in the astonishing city, thrilling desert and craziest racing tracks. Its not so easy to celebrate the shine of gold medal, you have to first defeat the rivals to get the feast.
